parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
summarize Count = count() by subscriptionId
| project value = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId), label = subscriptionId, Selected = Count >= 0

parameters.name: SubscriptionID
parameters.query:
resourcecontainers
 | where type == "microsoft.resources/subscriptions"
 | summarize Count = count() by subscriptionId
 | project Label = subscriptionId, Id = subscriptionId, Selected = Count >= 0

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| summarize by id, name
| project id
parameters.label: Log Analytics Workspace

parameters.name: ResourceGroup
parameters.query:
resources
| where type contains  "desktopvirtualization"
| summarize Count = count() by resourceGroup
| project Label = resourceGroup, Id = resourceGroup, Selected = Count >= 0

parameters.name: HostPool
parameters.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.desktopvirtualization/hostpools"
| summarize Count = count() by name, id
| project Label = name, Id = id, Selected = Count >= 1

content.json:
This workbook relies on the following:
* Windows Virtual Desktop spring release with WCD Diagnostic Logs enabled
* Azure Monitor VMInsights with Map enabled
* Azure Monitor Log Analytics workspace, with the performance counter and event log collection as detailed in *[this document](dummyurl)*.
* AAD Diagnostic Logs enabled

content.query:
resources
| where type contains  "desktopvirtualization"
| parse type with * "microsoft.desktopvirtualization/" TypeName
| summarize Resources=count() by TypeName
| order by Resources desc
content.title: WVD Resources
content.noDataMessage: No WVD resources detected. Please select the subscription that contains your WVD resources

content.query:
let WVDHosts = dynamic([{WVDHosts}]);
WVDConnections
| extend HostPool = '{HostPool}'
| extend HostPool = strcat(HostPool, "/")
| extend Computername = strcat(HostPool, SessionHostName)
| where Computername in (WVDHosts)
|sort by TimeGenerated asc, CorrelationId
|summarize Sessions = dcount(CorrelationId) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
content.title: Daily Connections - Rolling 7 days
content.noDataMessage: No sessions detected in the last 7 days.

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where ResourceDisplayName == "Windows Virtual Desktop"
| summarize arg_max(CorrelationId, *) by CorrelationId
| project ["City"]= LocationDetails.city, LocationDetails.geoCoordinates.longitude, LocationDetails.geoCoordinates.latitude
content.title: Logon Location Heatmap - Rolling 7 days
content.noDataMessage: No logons detected in the last 7 days

content.query:
let WVDHosts = dynamic([{WVDHosts}]);
WVDConnections
| extend HostPool = '{HostPool}'
| extend HostPool = strcat(HostPool, "/")
| extend Computername = strcat(HostPool, SessionHostName)
| where Computername in (WVDHosts)
| where Type =~"WVDConnections" and State =~ "Connected" 
| extend Multi=split(_ResourceId, "/")
| project ResourceAlias, HostPool=toupper(HP=Multi[8]), SessionHostName , UserName ,CState=iff(SessionHostOSVersion=="<>","Failure","Success"), CorrelationId, TimeGenerated, ResourceGroup=Multi[4], DesktopGroup_s=toupper(strcat(RG=Multi[4],".", HP=Multi[8])), StartTime=TimeGenerated
| join (WVDConnections
| where State == "Completed"
| project EndTime=TimeGenerated, CorrelationId)
on CorrelationId
| project Duration = EndTime - StartTime,UserName
| summarize Duration=avg(Duration) by UserName
| sort by Duration desc
| take 5
content.title: Top 5 Average Session Durations by User

content.query: {"version":"ARMEndpoint/1.0","data":null,"headers":[],"method":"GET","path":"{SubscriptionID}/resourcegroups/{ResourceGroup}/providers/Microsoft.DesktopVirtualization/hostpools/{HostPool}?api-version=2019-01-23-preview","urlParams":[],"batchDisabled":false,"transformers":[{"type":"jsonpath","settings":{"tablePath":"$.properties","columns":[{"path":"$.hostPoolType","columnid":"HostPoolType"},{"path":"$.maxSessionLimit","columnid":"MaxSessionLimit"}]}}]}

let WVDHosts = dynamic([{WVDHosts}]);
Heartbeat
| extend HostPool = '{HostPool}'
| extend FullName = strcat(HostPool, "/", Computer)
| where FullName in (WVDHosts)
| join (Perf
| where (ObjectName == "Terminal Services" and CounterName == "Active Sessions")
| make-series TSActTrend = avg(CounterValue) default=0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ObjectName, Computer | project TSActTrend, Computer) on Computer
| join (Perf
| where (ObjectName == "Memory" and CounterName == "% Committed Bytes In Use")
| make-series MemTrend = avg(CounterValue) default=0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ObjectName, Computer | project MemTrend, Computer) on Computer
| join (Perf
| where (ObjectName == "Processor" and CounterName == "% Processor Time")
| make-series CPUTrend = avg(CounterValue) default=0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ObjectName, Computer | project CPUTrend, Computer) on Computer
| project Computer, FullName, HostPool, TSActTrend, MemTrend, CPUTrend

let WVDHosts = dynamic([{WVDHosts}]);
WVDConnections
| extend HostPool = '{HostPool}'
| extend HostPool = strcat(HostPool, "/")
| extend Computername = strcat(HostPool, SessionHostName)
| where Computername in (WVDHosts)
| where State == "Connected"
| summarize UserCount = count() by UserName
| sort by UserCount desc
| take 5
content.title: Top 5 Active Users
content.noDataMessage: No active users detected in the selected time period.

content.query:
let WVDHosts = dynamic([{WVDHosts}]);
WVDConnections
| extend HostPool = '{HostPool}'
| extend HostPool = strcat(HostPool, "/")
| extend Computername = strcat(HostPool, SessionHostName)
| where Computername in (WVDHosts)

content.query:
let WVDHosts = dynamic([{WVDHosts}]);
Perf
| extend HostPool = '{HostPool}'
| extend HostPool = strcat(HostPool, "/")
| extend Computername = strcat(HostPool, Computer)
| where Computername in (WVDHosts)
| where ObjectName == "Terminal Services" 
| where CounterName == "Active Sessions" 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Computer
| project Computer, CounterName, CounterValue
| order by CounterValue desc
| take 5

Perf

content.query:
let WVDHosts = dynamic([{WVDHosts}]);
Perf
| extend HostPool = '{HostPool}'
| extend HostPool = strcat(HostPool, "/")
| extend Computername = strcat(HostPool, Computer)
| where Computername in (WVDHosts)
| where ObjectName == "Terminal Services" 
| where CounterName == "Total Sessions" 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Computer
| project Computer, CounterName, CounterValue
| order by CounterValue desc
| take 5
content.title: Total Sessions top 5 Hosts
content.noDataMessage: No total sessions detected in the selected time range. If there have been sessions, please ensure that the Terminal Services counters are being collected into your workspace.

content.query:
let WVDHosts = dynamic([{WVDHosts}]);
Perf
| extend HostPool = '{HostPool}'
| extend HostPool = strcat(HostPool, "/")
| extend Computername = strcat(HostPool, Computer)
| where Computername in (WVDHosts)
| where CounterName == "Active Sessions"
| extend ActiveSessions = toint(CounterValue)
| project Computer, ActiveTimeStamp=TimeGenerated, ActiveSessions 
| join kind= inner (
   Perf
   | where CounterName == "Inactive Sessions"
   | extend totalinactivesessions = toint(CounterValue)
   | extend InactiveSessions = totalinactivesessions - 2
   | project Computer, InactiveTimeStamp=TimeGenerated, InactiveSessions  
) on Computer 
| where (ActiveTimeStamp - InactiveTimeStamp) between (0min .. 15s)
| project ActiveSessions, InactiveSessions, bin(ActiveTimeStamp, 5m)
content.title: Session Status History
content.noDataMessage: No Session History information. If you have had active sessions in the selected time period, please ensure that the collection of the Terminal Services counters into your workspace has been enabled.

parameters.name: TSSessions
parameters.label: Terminal Server Session Counters
parameters.query:
Perf
| where ObjectName == "Terminal Services"
| summarize by CounterName

content.query:
let WVDHosts = dynamic([{WVDHosts}]);
let Counter = dynamic([{TSSessions}]);
Perf
| extend HostPool = '{HostPool}'
| extend HostPool = strcat(HostPool, "/")
| extend Computername = strcat(HostPool, Computer)
| where Computername in (WVDHosts)
| where ObjectName == "Terminal Services" and CounterName in (Counter)
| summarize AggregatedValue = avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), CounterName, Computer

WVDErrors
| parse _ResourceId with * "/hostpools/" HostPoolName
| where HostPoolName in ('{HostPool}')
| summarize count() by UserName
content.title: Top users encountering errors
content.noDataMessage: No errors detected in the selected time period

content.query:
let WVDHosts = dynamic([{WVDHosts}]);
WVDConnections
| extend HostPool = '{HostPool}'
| extend HostPool = strcat(HostPool, "/")
| extend Computername = strcat(HostPool, SessionHostName)
| where Computername in (WVDHosts)
| where State == "Connected"
| extend ClientOSType = pack("ClientOSVersion", ClientOS)
| project _ResourceId, TimeGenerated, UserName, State, ClientOS, ClientVersion, ClientType, ConnectionType, ResourceAlias, SessionHostName, SessionHostIPAddress
content.title: WVD Connected Session Details
content.noDataMessage: No Connected Sessions detected in the selected time period

content.query:
WVDErrors
| parse _ResourceId with * "/hostpools/" HostPoolName
| where HostPoolName in ('{HostPool}')
| where ServiceError =="false"
| summarize usercount = count(UserName) by CodeSymbolic
| project CodeSymbolic, usercount
| sort by usercount desc
content.title: WVD Errors by type
content.noDataMessage: No errors reported in the selected time period

content.query:
let errorcode = iff(isnotnull('{wvderror}'),errorcode = '{wvderror}', errorcode = 'All');
WVDErrors
| where CodeSymbolic == errorcode
| project TimeGenerated,  _ResourceId, UserName, ActivityType, Source, Code, CodeSymbolic, Message, ServiceError, CorrelationId
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| take 20
content.title: WVD Errors by type - {wvderror}
content.noDataMessage: Please select one of the error categories in the graph above to display the error logs

parameters.name: UserName
parameters.description: Please enter the username you would like to explore

content.query:
WVDConnections
|where UserName contains '{UserName}'
|take 100
|sort by TimeGenerated asc, CorrelationId
|summarize  Connectcount = dcount(CorrelationId) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
content.title: Connections per day for user {UserName}
content.noDataMessage: No connections detected for this user in the specified time frame

content.query:
WVDConnections
|where UserName contains '{UserName}'
|sort by TimeGenerated asc, CorrelationId
| project TimeGenerated, CorrelationId, _ResourceId, SessionHostName, SessionHostIPAddress, UserName, State, ClientOS, ClientVersion, ClientType, ConnectionType, ResourceAlias, TenantId
content.title: All connections for user {UserName}
content.noDataMessage: No connections detected in the specified time frame

content.query:
let Events = WVDConnections 
| where UserName contains '{UserName}' ;
Events
| where State == "Connected"
| project CorrelationId , UserName, ResourceAlias , StartTime=TimeGenerated
| join (Events
| where State == "Completed"
| project EndTime=TimeGenerated, CorrelationId)
on CorrelationId
| project Duration = EndTime - StartTime, ResourceAlias
| sort by Duration desc
content.title: Connection Duration for user {UserName}

content.query:
WVDErrors
| where UserName contains '{UserName}'
| project TimeGenerated, CorrelationId, _ResourceId, UserName, ActivityType, Source, Code, CodeSymbolic, Message, TenantId
content.title: WVD Errors by User - {UserName}
content.noDataMessage: No errors detected in the specified time range

content.query:
Perf
| where ObjectName == "Process" and CounterName == "% User Time"
| join
(
VMProcess
| where UserName !contains "system" and UserName !contains "service"
| extend InstanceName = ExecutableName
| project TimeGenerated, InstanceName, Computer, UserName, UserDomain
)
on InstanceName
| summarize AggregatedValue = avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 10m), InstanceName, CounterName, UserName, Computer
content.title: % User Time by Process

content.query:
Perf
| where ObjectName == "Process" and CounterName == "% Processor Time"
| join
(
VMProcess
| where UserName !contains "system" and UserName !contains "service"
| extend InstanceName = ExecutableName
| project TimeGenerated, InstanceName, Computer, UserName, UserDomain
)
on InstanceName
| summarize AggregatedValue = avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 10m), InstanceName, CounterName, UserName, Computer
content.title: % User Time by Process

content.query:
Perf
| where ObjectName == "Process" and CounterName == "IO Write Operations/sec"
| join
(
VMProcess
| where UserName !contains "system" and UserName !contains "service"
| extend InstanceName = ExecutableName
| project TimeGenerated, InstanceName, Computer, UserName, UserDomain
)
on InstanceName
| summarize AggregatedValue = avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 10m), InstanceName, CounterName, UserName, Computer
content.title: Disk IO Write Operations/sec by Process

content.query:
Perf
| where ObjectName == "Process" and CounterName == "IO Read Operations/sec"
| join
(
VMProcess
| where UserName !contains "system" and UserName !contains "service"
| extend InstanceName = ExecutableName
| project TimeGenerated, InstanceName, Computer, UserName, UserDomain
)
on InstanceName
| summarize AggregatedValue = avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 10m), InstanceName, CounterName, UserName, Computer
content.title: Disk IO Read Operations/sec by Process

content.query:
let WVDHosts = dynamic([{WVDHosts}]);
Heartbeat
| extend HostPool = '{HostPool}'
| extend HostPool = strcat(HostPool, "/")
| extend Computername = strcat(HostPool, Computer)
| where Computername in (WVDHosts)
| join (Perf
| where (ObjectName == "Terminal Services" and CounterName == "Active Sessions")
| make-series TSActTrend = avg(CounterValue) default=0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ObjectName, Computer | project TSActTrend, Computer) on Computer
| join (Perf
| where (ObjectName == "Memory" and CounterName == "% Committed Bytes In Use")
| make-series MemTrend = avg(CounterValue) default=0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ObjectName, Computer | project MemTrend, Computer) on Computer
| join (Perf
| where (ObjectName == "Processor" and CounterName == "% Processor Time")
| make-series CPUTrend = avg(CounterValue) default=0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ObjectName, Computer | project CPUTrend, Computer) on Computer
| join (Perf
| where (ObjectName == "Network Adapter" and CounterName == "Bytes Received/sec")
| make-series NWRTrend = avg(CounterValue) default=0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ObjectName, Computer | project NWRTrend, Computer) on Computer
| join (Perf
| where (ObjectName == "Network Adapter" and CounterName == "Bytes Sent/sec")
| make-series NWSTrend = avg(CounterValue) default=0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ObjectName, Computer | project NWSTrend, Computer) on Computer
| project Computer, TSActTrend, MemTrend, CPUTrend, NWRTrend, NWSTrend
content.title: Host Performance Overview
content.noDataMessage: No performance counters to display. Please confirm that you have enabled the performance counter collection in your Log Analytics workspace

content.query:
let WVDHosts = dynamic([{WVDHosts}]);
Perf
| extend HostPool = '{HostPool}'
| extend HostPool = strcat(HostPool, "/")
| extend Computername = strcat(HostPool, Computer)
| where Computername in (WVDHosts)
| where (ObjectName == "Logical Disk" or ObjectName == "LogicalDisk") and CounterName contains "%" and InstanceName != "_Total" and InstanceName !contains "HarddiskVolume"
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, ObjectName, CounterName, InstanceName, CounterValue 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Computer, InstanceName
| extend SpaceUsed = (100-CounterValue)
| top 10 by SpaceUsed desc
content.title: Top 10 Hosts - Disk % Free Space

content.query:
let WVDHosts = dynamic([{WVDHosts}]);
Perf
| extend HostPool = '{HostPool}'
| extend HostPool = strcat(HostPool, "/")
| extend Computername = strcat(HostPool, Computer)
| where Computername in (WVDHosts)
| where ObjectName == "Processor" and CounterName == "% Processor Time"
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, ObjectName, CounterName, InstanceName, CounterValue 
| summarize AggregatedValue = avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), Computer
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Computer
| top 10 by AggregatedValue desc
content.title: Top 10 Hosts - Processor Utilisation

content.query:
let WVDHosts = dynamic([{WVDHosts}]);
Perf
| extend HostPool = '{HostPool}'
| extend HostPool = strcat(HostPool, "/")
| extend Computername = strcat(HostPool, Computer)
| where Computername in (WVDHosts)
| where ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" and CounterName == "% Free Space" 
| where InstanceName <> "_Total" 
| summarize AggregatedValue = avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 10m), Computer, InstanceName
content.title: Logical Disk Space Used by Host

content.query:
let WVDHosts = dynamic([{WVDHosts}]);
Perf
| extend HostPool = '{HostPool}'
| extend HostPool = strcat(HostPool, "/")
| extend Computername = strcat(HostPool, Computer)
| where Computername in (WVDHosts)
| where ObjectName == "Processor" and CounterName == "% Processor Time"
| summarize AggregatedValue = avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 10m), Computer, InstanceName
content.title: Processor % Processor Time per host

content.query:
let WVDHosts = dynamic([{WVDHosts}]);
Perf
| extend HostPool = '{HostPool}'
| extend HostPool = strcat(HostPool, "/")
| extend Computername = strcat(HostPool, Computer)
| where Computername in (WVDHosts)
| where ObjectName == "Memory" and CounterName == "% Committed Bytes In Use"
| summarize AggregatedValue = avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 10m), Computer
content.title: Memory % Committed bytes in use per Host

content.query:
let WVDHosts = dynamic([{WVDHosts}]);
Perf
| extend HostPool = '{HostPool}'
| extend HostPool = strcat(HostPool, "/")
| extend Computername = strcat(HostPool, Computer)
| where Computername in (WVDHosts)
| where ObjectName == "Network Interface" 
| summarize AggregatedValue = avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 10m), Computer, InstanceName, CounterName
content.title: Network Usage per host

content.query:
let WVDHosts = dynamic([{WVDHosts}]);
Perf
| extend HostPool = '{HostPool}'
| extend HostPool = strcat(HostPool, "/")
| extend Computername = strcat(HostPool, Computer)
| where Computername in (WVDHosts)
| where ObjectName == "RemoteFX Network" and InstanceName matches regex @"rdp-sxs\d{9}\s\d{0,6}" and CounterName == "Current TCP RTT" and CounterValue > 0
| summarize  RTTLatency =avg(CounterValue) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), InstanceName
| order by RTTLatency desc
content.title: RTT Latency avg by Computer

content.query:
let WVDHosts = dynamic([{WVDHosts}]);
Perf
| extend HostPool = '{HostPool}'
| extend HostPool = strcat(HostPool, "/")
| extend Computername = strcat(HostPool, Computer)
| where Computername in (WVDHosts)
| where ObjectName == "PhysicalDisk" and InstanceName !contains "Total"
| join (Perf
| where (ObjectName == "PhysicalDisk" and CounterName == "Avg. Disk Bytes/Read")
| make-series AvgDiskBytesRead = avg(CounterValue) default=0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ObjectName, Computer | project AvgDiskBytesRead, Computer) on Computer
| join (Perf
| where (ObjectName == "PhysicalDisk" and CounterName == "Avg. Disk Bytes/Write")
| make-series AvgDiskBytesWrite = avg(CounterValue) default=0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ObjectName, Computer | project AvgDiskBytesWrite, Computer) on Computer
| join (Perf
| where (ObjectName == "PhysicalDisk" and CounterName == "Avg. Disk sec/Write")
| make-series AvgDiskSecBytesWrite = avg(CounterValue) default=0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ObjectName, Computer | project AvgDiskSecBytesWrite, Computer) on Computer
| join (Perf
| where (ObjectName == "PhysicalDisk" and CounterName == "Avg. Disk sec/Read")
| make-series DiskReadsSec = avg(CounterValue) default=0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ObjectName, Computer | project DiskReadsSec, Computer) on Computer
| join (Perf
| where (ObjectName == "PhysicalDisk" and CounterName == "Avg. Disk Bytes/Transfer")
| make-series AvgDiskSecBytesTransfer = avg(CounterValue) default=0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ObjectName, Computer | project AvgDiskSecBytesTransfer, Computer) on Computer
| join (Perf
| where (ObjectName == "PhysicalDisk" and CounterName == "Avg. Disk sec/Transfer")
| make-series AvgDiskSecTransfer = avg(CounterValue) default=0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ObjectName, Computer | project AvgDiskSecTransfer, Computer) on Computer
| project Computer, AvgDiskBytesRead, AvgDiskBytesWrite, AvgDiskSecBytesWrite, DiskReadsSec, AvgDiskSecBytesTransfer, AvgDiskSecTransfer

parameters.name: DiskCounter
parameters.label: Disk Counter
parameters.query:
Perf
| where ObjectName == "LogicalDisk"
| summarize Count = count() by CounterName
| project value = CounterName, label = CounterName, Selected = Count >= 0

content.query:
let WVDHosts = dynamic([{WVDHosts}]);
let Counter = dynamic([{DiskCounter}]);
Perf
| extend HostPool = '{HostPool}'
| extend HostPool = strcat(HostPool, "/")
| extend Computername = strcat(HostPool, Computer)
| where Computername in (WVDHosts)
| where ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" and CounterName in (Counter) and InstanceName !contains "Total"
| summarize AggregatedValue = avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 10m), CounterName, Computer, InstanceName
content.title: {DiskCounter}
